payload.content: OpenAI recently published details on how they built their internal data agent, which includes 6 layers of context, a self-learning memory system, and production lessons.

name: OpenAI recently published details on how they built their internal data agent, w
content: OpenAI recently published details on how they built their internal data agent, which includes 6 layers of context, a self-learning memory system, and production lessons.

payload.content: The OpenAI data agent is one of the best enterprise use-cases for agents.

name: The OpenAI data agent is one of the best enterprise use-cases for agents.
content: The OpenAI data agent is one of the best enterprise use-cases for agents.

payload.content: OpenAI's architecture for their data agent validates the 'gpu-poor continuous learning' approach.

name: OpenAI's architecture for their data agent validates the 'gpu-poor continuous le
content: OpenAI's architecture for their data agent validates the 'gpu-poor continuous learning' approach.

payload.content: Dash is a self-learning data agent that grounds its answers in 6 layers of context and improves with every run.

name: Dash is a self-learning data agent that grounds its answers in 6 layers of conte
content: Dash is a self-learning data agent that grounds its answers in 6 layers of context and improves with every run.

payload.content: Without sufficient context, even strong models hallucinate column names, miss type quirks, and ignore tribal knowledge.

name: Without sufficient context, even strong models hallucinate column names, miss ty
content: Without sufficient context, even strong models hallucinate column names, miss type quirks, and ignore tribal knowledge.

payload.content: Most Text-to-SQL agents are stateless, leading to repeated mistakes because each session starts fresh.

name: Most Text-to-SQL agents are stateless, leading to repeated mistakes because each
content: Most Text-to-SQL agents are stateless, leading to repeated mistakes because each session starts fresh.

payload.content: Dash implements 6 layers of context to address issues of hallucination and statelessness in Text-to-SQL agents: Table Usage, Human Annotations, Query Patterns, Institutional Knowledge, Memory, and Runtime Context.

name: Dash implements 6 layers of context to address issues of hallucination and state
content: Dash implements 6 layers of context to address issues of hallucination and statelessness in Text-to-SQL agents: Table Usage, Human Annotations, Query Patterns, Institutional Knowledge, Memory, and Runtime Context.

payload.content: A data agent can retrieve relevant context at runtime via hybrid search, use this to generate grounded SQL, and then use the results to deliver insights.

name: A data agent can retrieve relevant context at runtime via hybrid search, use thi
content: A data agent can retrieve relevant context at runtime via hybrid search, use this to generate grounded SQL, and then use the results to deliver insights.

payload.content: Dash learns through two complementary systems: Static Knowledge (curated by teams, including validated queries, business context, schemas, data quality notes, metric definitions, tribal knowledge, and gotchas) and Continuous Learning (patterns discovered through trial and error, improving with usage).

name: Dash learns through two complementary systems: Static Knowledge (curated by team
content: Dash learns through two complementary systems: Static Knowledge (curated by teams, including validated queries, business context, schemas, data quality notes, metric definitions, tribal knowledge, and gotchas) and Continuous Learning (patterns discovered through trial and error, improving with usage).

payload.content: Gpu-poor continuous learning is a method where a system learns through trial and error without requiring GPUs, exemplified by Dash's learning machine configuration.

name: Gpu-poor continuous learning is a method where a system learns through trial and
content: Gpu-poor continuous learning is a method where a system learns through trial and error without requiring GPUs, exemplified by Dash's learning machine configuration.

payload.content: To set up Dash, clone the repository, copy `example.env` to `.env` and add your `OPENAI_API_KEY`, then use `docker compose up -d --build` to start services, and `docker exec` commands to load sample data and knowledge.

name: To set up Dash, clone the repository, copy `example.env` to `.env` and add your
content: To set up Dash, clone the repository, copy `example.env` to `.env` and add your `OPENAI_API_KEY`, then use `docker compose up -d --build` to start services, and `docker exec` commands to load sample data and knowledge.

payload.content: To connect to the Dash UI, open os.agno.com, add a local OS connection to http://localhost:8000, and then connect.

name: To connect to the Dash UI, open os.agno.com, add a local OS connection to http:/
content: To connect to the Dash UI, open os.agno.com, add a local OS connection to http://localhost:8000, and then connect.

payload.content: Dash includes an evaluation suite supporting string matching, LLM grading, and golden SQL comparison, which can be run via `docker exec -it dash-api python -m dash.evals.run_evals` with optional flags for grading and golden SQL.

name: Dash includes an evaluation suite supporting string matching, LLM grading, and g
content: Dash includes an evaluation suite supporting string matching, LLM grading, and golden SQL comparison, which can be run via `docker exec -it dash-api python -m dash.evals.run_evals` with optional flags for grading and golden SQL.

payload.content: Data agents are currently one of the best enterprise use cases for AI.

name: Data agents are currently one of the best enterprise use cases for AI.
content: Data agents are currently one of the best enterprise use cases for AI.

payload.content: Every company over a certain size should have a data agent.

name: Every company over a certain size should have a data agent.
content: Every company over a certain size should have a data agent.
